item.title: Forget Sci-Fi: Humanoid Robots & Brain-Inspired Chips Are Here! (What Powers the AI Revolution?)
item.description: An overview of AI hardware innovations (GPUs, accelerators, neuromorphic, quantum, photonic) and the rise of Embodied AI, focusing on humanoid robots.
